0.title: Transfer of power banks to the forefront!

1.title: On the front lines, our soldiers are sometimes forced to provide themselves with food. The boys were given portable gas stoves - heaters for cooking food and heating.

2.title: The Fund handed over plate carriers and first-aid kits in the NATO format.

4.title: Transfer of humanitarian aid in the front-line zone.

5.title: Folding beds of the NATO standard have arrived to the forefront
